name: Human Oversight
description: Degree to which human oversight and intervention are incorporated into the AI system's operation.

values.name: Human-in-the-Loop
values.description: Human-in-the-loop system with well-defined roles and responsibilities, clear procedures for human-machine collaboration, and mechanisms for human oversight at various stages of the system's operation.

values.name: Clear Mechanisms
values.description: Clear mechanisms for human review and intervention in the system's decision-making process, with well-defined roles and responsibilities for human operators.

values.name: Limited Oversight
values.description: Limited human oversight, primarily reactive (e.g., users can report errors), no clear mechanisms for human intervention or override.

values.name: None
values.description: No human oversight or intervention in the AI system's decision-making process.
